column.name: message
column.value: Check attribute schemeID. Must be UUID.

column.name: note
column.value: Must be according to RFC4122 format for UUID.

column.name: message
column.value: Check Format. Must be according to the specified schemeID.

column.name: expression
column.value: (creationDateTime == null || creationDateTime.dateTime == null) || creationDateTime != null && creationDateTime.dateTime != null && isNotUTC(creationDateTime)

column.name: message
column.value: Check Format. Must be date in UTC according to ISO8601

column.name: message
column.value: Date must be in the past.

column.name: message
column.value: Check attribute listID. Must be FLUX_GP_PURPOSE

column.name: message
column.value: Code for cancellation is not allowed

column.name: message
column.value: Check attribute listID. Must be FLUX_GP_PARTY

column.name: expression
column.value: !isAuction() && (isReport() && IDS != null && IDS.get(0) != null && IDS.get(0).getValue() != null && !mdrService.isPresentInMDRList("FLUX_GP_PARTY", IDS.get(0).getValue(), creationDateOfMessage))

column.name: message
column.value: Check format of the part corresponding to the national number

column.name: message
column.value: check format of the common part

column.name: expression
column.value: ID != null && ID.getSchemeId() != null && !mdrService.isPresentInMDRList("FLUX_SALES_PARTY_ID_TYPE", ID.getSchemeId(), creationDateOfMessage)

column.name: expression
column.value: (occurrenceDateTime == null || occurrenceDateTime.dateTime == null) || occurrenceDateTime != null && occurrenceDateTime.dateTime != null && isNotUTC(occurrenceDateTime)

column.name: expression
column.value: speciesCode != null && speciesCode.getValue() != null && !mdrService.isPresentInMDRList("FAO_SPECIES", speciesCode.getValue(), creationDateOfMessage)

column.name: message
column.value: Check unit code: must be KGM

column.name: expression
column.value: weightMeasure != null && speciesCode != null && speciesCode.value != null && !speciesCode.value.equals("BFT") && getNumberOfDecimalPlaces(weightMeasure.value) > 2

column.name: message
column.value: Check code from the list listID

column.name: expression
column.value: endDateTime != null && (endDateTime.dateTime == null || endDateTime.dateTime != null && isNotUTC(endDateTime))

column.name: message
column.value: Check attribute schemeID. Must be EU_TRIP_ID

column.name: message
column.value: Check format. Must be according to schemeID rules

column.name: message
column.value: Check attribute listID. Must be FLUX_LOCATION_TYPE

column.name: message
column.value: Check code. Must be existing in the list specified in attribute listID

column.name: message
column.value: Check attribute listID. Must be TERRITORY

column.name: message
column.value: Check code. Must be existing in the list specified in attribute listID

column.name: message
column.value: Check attribute listID. In case Type= 'AREA': must be FAO_AREA, TERRITORY, In case Type= 'LOCATION': must be LOCATION, FARM

column.name: message
column.value: If FAO_AREA code, the more precise area must be mentioned

column.name: message
column.value: Check code. Must be existing in the list specified in attribute listID

column.name: expression
column.value: latitudeMeasure != null && latitudeMeasure.getValue() != null && !isBigDecimalBetween(latitudeMeasure.getValue(), BigDecimal.valueOf(-90), BigDecimal.valueOf(90))

column.name: message
column.value: Check range. Must be between -90 and 90

column.name: expression
column.value: longitudeMeasure != null && longitudeMeasure.getValue() != null && !isBigDecimalBetween(longitudeMeasure.getValue(), BigDecimal.valueOf(-180), BigDecimal.valueOf(180))

column.name: message
column.value: Check range. Must be between -180 and 180

column.name: expression
column.value: FLUXReportDocument != null && FLUXReportDocument.getPurposeCode() != null && FLUXReportDocument.getPurposeCode().getValue() != "3" && (salesReports == null || salesReports.size() != 1)

column.name: message
column.value: One and only one occurrence of a sales report if purpose is not 'delete'

column.name: message
column.value: If correction or deletion, the referenced identification must be provided

column.name: expression
column.value: purposeCode != null && purposeCode.getValue().equals("9") && referencedID != null && referencedID.value != null

column.name: message
column.value: If it is a new message (creation), the referenced identification must be empty

column.name: message
column.value: PROVIDER role must exist for a SN

column.name: message
column.value: SELLER/BUYER role must exist for a SN when products are bought (not withdrawn)

column.name: message
column.value: RECIPIENT role must exist for a Take-over doc

column.name: note
column.value: If the stored products can benefit from the market mechanisms defined by Regulation (EU) n°1379/2013, a reference to a sales note should exist

column.name: message
column.value: For a take-over doc, if the usage code equals 'STO' (Storage), the SN identifier should be communicated

column.name: expression
column.value: roleCodes != null && !valueContainsAny(roleCodes, "SENDER") && ID == null || (ID != null && isEmpty(ID.getValue()))

column.name: message
column.value: One of the two must be available

column.name: message
column.value: Usage must be for non direct human consumption if BMS species

column.name: message
column.value: It must not be a LOCATION code for AAP products

column.name: message
column.value: If BMS species, the category should be N/A

column.name: message
column.value: It must be a LOCATION code for the landing

column.name: message
column.value: At least one occurrence and maximum two

column.name: message
column.value: Codes other than master/operator are not allowed

column.name: message
column.value: Must be present for each party

column.name: message
column.value: Check presence. Must be present if AliasText is not present.

column.name: message
column.value: Check presence. Must be present if AliasText is not present.

column.name: expression
column.value: alias == null && givenName == null && familyName == null

column.name: message
column.value: Check presence. Must be present if GivenNameText or FamilyNameText is not.

column.name: message
column.value: Check presence. Must be present if Type is LOCATION or ADDRESS.

column.name: message
column.value: Check presence. Must be present, unless type is 'POSITION'

column.name: expression
column.value: ID != null && ID.getSchemeId() != null && "LOCATION".equals(ID.getSchemeId()) && (isBlank(countryID) || mdrService.isLocationNotInCountry(ID, countryID, creationDateOfMessage))

column.name: message
column.value: If LOCATION code, the place must be in the country

column.name: note
column.value: Must be present if location type is POSITION.

column.name: message
column.value: Check presence. Must be present if Type=POSITION.

column.name: expression
column.value: ID == null && physicalStructuredAddress == null && (specifiedPhysicalFLUXGeographicalCoordinate == null || specifiedPhysicalFLUXGeographicalCoordinate.getLongitudeMeasure() == null || specifiedPhysicalFLUXGeographicalCoordinate.getLatitudeMeasure() == null)

column.name: message
column.value: Latitude & longitude must be provided if there is no identification and no address

column.name: note
column.value: Must be present if location type is ADDRESS.

column.name: message
column.value: Check presence. Must be present if location Type is ADDRESS.

column.name: message
column.value: At least one value must be present

column.name: message
column.value: Must be present if validation document

column.name: expression
column.value: (submittedDateTime == null || submittedDateTime.dateTime == null) || submittedDateTime != null && submittedDateTime.dateTime != null && isNotUTC(submittedDateTime)

column.name: expression
column.value: isQuery() && IDS != null && !IDS.isEmpty() && IDS.get(0) != null && !mdrService.isPresentInMDRList("FLUX_GP_PARTY", IDS.get(0).getValue(), creationDateOfMessage)

column.name: expression
column.value: isQuery() && ((startDateTime == null || startDateTime.dateTime == null) || (startDateTime != null && startDateTime.dateTime != null && isNotUTC(startDateTime)))

column.name: expression
column.value: isQuery() && ((endDateTime == null || endDateTime.dateTime == null) || (endDateTime != null && endDateTime.dateTime != null && isNotUTC(endDateTime)))

column.name: message
column.value: If Type = FLAG/ROLE/PLACE, Check code of the value

column.name: expression
column.value: typeCode != null && typeCode.getValue() == "VESSEL" && !(valueID == null || isEmpty(valueID.getValue()) || isIdTypeValidFormat("CFR", valueID))

column.name: note
column.value: If no value, the query is for all fishing vessels

column.name: message
column.value: If Type=VESSEL, Check format of CFR

column.name: message
column.value: If Type = SALES_ID or TRIP_ID: Check format of the part corresponding to the national number

column.name: message
column.value: If Type = SALES_ID or TRIP_ID: Check format of the common part

column.name: message
column.value: Check attribute schemeID. Must be UUID.

column.name: note
column.value: Must be according to RFC4122 format for UUID.

column.name: message
column.value: Check Format. Must be according to the specified schemeID.

column.name: message
column.value: Check attribute schemeID. Must be in the FLUX_GP_MSG_ID list

column.name: note
column.value: Must be according to RFC4122 format for UUID.

column.name: message
column.value: Check Format. Must be according to the specified schemeID.

column.name: message
column.value: Check attribute listID. Must be FLUX_GP_RESPONSE

column.name: message
column.value: Check value. Code must be value of the specified code list in listID.

column.name: expression
column.value: (creationDateTime == null || creationDateTime.dateTime == null) || creationDateTime != null && creationDateTime.dateTime != null && isNotUTC(creationDateTime)

column.name: message
column.value: Check Format. Must be date in UTC according to ISO8601

column.name: message
column.value: Check attribute listID. Must be FLUX_GP_PARTY

column.name: expression
column.value: (creationDateTime == null || creationDateTime.dateTime == null) || creationDateTime != null && creationDateTime.dateTime != null && isNotUTC(creationDateTime)

column.name: message
column.value: Check value. Code must be value of the specified code list in listID.

column.name: message
column.value: Check Code. Must be in the list specified in listID.

column.name: message
column.value: Check Code. Must be in the list specified in listID.

column.name: note
column.value: If no value, the query is for all flag states

column.name: message
column.value: Type=ROLE, values FLAG or LAND only for MS INT for international organization

column.name: expression
column.value: isQuery() && startDateTime != null && endDateTime != null && startDateTime.getDateTime() != null && endDateTime.getDateTime() != null && startDateTime.getDateTime().getMillis() > endDateTime.getDateTime().getMillis()

column.name: message
column.value: Must be present if ResponseCode != OK

column.name: message
column.value: At least one occurrence if not link with the Sales Report

column.name: message
column.value: The Creation must be <= to the Creation of the report

column.name: message
column.value: In case of a correction, the item type must be the same as the item type of the referenced report

column.name: message
column.value: The identification must be unique and not already exist

column.name: message
column.value: The referenced identification must be the one of a an existing sales report

column.name: message
column.value: Check if OwnerFLUXParty.ID is consistent with FLUX TL values.

column.name: message
column.value: It must be an official currency of the country at that date

column.name: message
column.value: If SENDER role, it should be a MS Identification

column.name: message
column.value: The reception date (by Market state) should not be later than 48h after the sale date

column.name: message
column.value: The reception date (by the Take-Over state) should not be later than 48h after the landing declaration date

column.name: message
column.value: If CFR, the vessel should be in the EU fleet under the flag state at landing date

column.name: note
column.value: Past data limited to three years from the current date

column.name: message
column.value: The identification must be unique and not already exist

column.name: message
column.value: Must be a reference of a query or sales declaration

column.name: message
column.value: Date must be in the past.

column.name: note
column.value: The party sending must be allowed to send the message

column.name: message
column.value: Check if RespondentFLUXParty.ID is consistent with FLUX TL values.

column.name: message
column.value: ID of Sales Party must start with RB- when the party is a provider

column.name: message
column.value: The name of the class 'FLUX_Party' must never be filled in

column.name: message
column.value: The BEL:SALE class cannot be deleted

column.name: message
column.value: BEL:SALECountry: code should exist in MDR
